mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vehicle_info (vid, car_id, battery_type, total_mileage_km, battery_health_percent) VALUES (#{vid}, #{carId}, #{batteryType}, #{totalMileageKm}, #{batteryHealthPercent})
mapper.update: UPDATE vehicle_info SET vid = #{vid}, car_id = #{carId}, battery_type = #{batteryType}, total_mileage_km = #{totalMileageKm}, battery_health_percent = #{batteryHealthPercent} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM vehicle_info ORDER BY id DESC
